皦字的基本解释

皦
jiǎo
古同“皎”，洁白，明亮。
玉石洁白的样子。
分明；清晰：“瓜分之形，皦如泰山。”
清白：“恢（人名）独皦然不污于法。”
姓。

皦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎo］
［《廣韻》古了切，上篠，見。］
(1)光亮洁白。
(2)分明；清晰。参见“皦如”。
(3)清楚明白。
(4)清白。参见“皦皦”、“皦然”。
(5)姓。明有皦生光。见清周亮工《书影》卷六。

皦字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【白字部】　皦； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页789第25
【唐韻】古了切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】吉了切，?音皎。【說文】玉石之白也。【廣韻】珠玉白貌。　又【玉篇】白也。【廣韻】皎也。【詩·王風】有如皦日。　又明也。【論語】皦如也。【註】樂之音節明也。　又星光明貌。【魏書·張淵·觀象賦】三台皦皦以雙列。　又姓。明萬曆時有皦生光，北方人。　【玉篇】與皎同。

皦字的起名意思

光亮洁白；分明，清晰；清楚明白；清白。

sparkling
Basic explanation of words
sparkling
jiǎo
The ancient tongs are "Jiao", white and bright.
The jade looks white.
Clear; clear: "The shape of the partition is like Mount Tai."
Innocence: "Hui (person's name) alone is not contaminated with the law."
name.
sparkling
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǎo］
["Guang Yun" is old and cut, Shang Xiao, see you. ]
(1) Bright and white.
(2) Clear; clear. See "Zuo Ru".
(3) Clearly understand.
(4) Innocence. See "Juan Zhu", "Juan Ran".
(5) Last name. Ming Youzuo gave birth to light. See Volume VI of Book Shadow by Zhou Lianggong in the Qing Dynasty.
sparkling

[Afternoon Concentration] [White Word Department] 　皦; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 789 Page 25
[Tang Yun] Ancient times [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Good luck cutting,? Yin Jiao. [Said the text] Jade is also white. [Guangyun] Pearl and jade white appearance.　[Jade articles] Bai Ye. [Guang Yun] Jiao Ye. 【Poetry·Wang Feng】It's like a day.　You Ming Ye. [The Analects] Jue Ruye. [Note] The syllables of music are clear.　The stars are bright again. 【Wei Shu·Zhang Yuan·Guanxiang Fu】Three Jujue in two rows.　Another last name. In the Wanli period of the Ming Dynasty, there were people born in the north.　【Jade articles】Same as Jiao.
